sqlMap.select: select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$

sqlMap.update: update TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER set ID = #id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_NO = #orderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:NUMBER#, ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:VARCHAR#, USER_ID = #userId:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID = #collectMoneyUserId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:NUMBER#, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #createSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, WORK_ORDER_NO = #workOrderNo:VARCHAR#, REMARKS = #remarks:VARCHAR#, CLENT_TYPE = #clentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #payChannel:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #version:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, STORE_CODE = #storeCode:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_CATALOG = #productCatalog:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_NAME = #productName:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_DESC = #productDesc:VARCHAR#, CLENT_ID = #clentId:VARCHAR#, USER_UA = #userUa:VARCHAR#, USER_IP = #userIp:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_ID = #identityId:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_TYPE = #identityType:NUMBER#, CALLBACK_URL = #callbackUrl:VARCHAR#, FCALLBACK_URL = #fcallbackUrl:VARCHAR#, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #payConfirmDate:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #isClearing:VARCHAR#, ORDER_SUBJECT = #orderSubject:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_STEP_NO = #businessStepNo:DECIMAL#, BANK_NAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, BANK_CARD_TYPE = #bankCardType:VARCHAR#, BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR#, OWNER_USER_NO = #ownerUserNo:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER set ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_NO = #record.orderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:NUMBER#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:VARCHAR#, USER_ID = #record.userId:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID = #record.collectMoneyUserId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #record.tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:NUMBER#, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #record.createSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, WORK_ORDER_NO = #record.workOrderNo:VARCHAR#, REMARKS = #record.remarks:VARCHAR#, CLENT_TYPE = #record.clentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #record.payChannel:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #record.version:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #record.serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, STORE_CODE = #record.storeCode:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NO = #record.accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #record.collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_CATALOG = #record.productCatalog:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_NAME = #record.productName:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_DESC = #record.productDesc:VARCHAR#, CLENT_ID = #record.clentId:VARCHAR#, USER_UA = #record.userUa:VARCHAR#, USER_IP = #record.userIp:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_ID = #record.identityId:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_TYPE = #record.identityType:NUMBER#, CALLBACK_URL = #record.callbackUrl:VARCHAR#, FCALLBACK_URL = #record.fcallbackUrl:VARCHAR#, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #record.payConfirmDate:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #record.isClearing:VARCHAR#, ORDER_SUBJECT = #record.orderSubject:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_STEP_NO = #record.businessStepNo:DECIMAL#, BANK_NAME = #record.bankName:VARCHAR#, BANK_CARD_TYPE = #record.bankCardType:VARCHAR#, BANK_CODE = #record.bankCode:VARCHAR#, OWNER_USER_NO = #record.ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO from ( select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO from ( select OUT.* , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, STORE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, IDENTITY_TYPE, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, IS_CLEARING, ORDER_SUBJECT, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CODE, OWNER_USER_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$
) OUT )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID as ID , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select
$selectedField$ as ID
TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER.ID as ID
, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$
) )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$
